Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell unit is constructed with Ni-YSZ as the anode.
Titulo: Effect of temperature and concentration on treating NO in simulated diesel exhaust via SOFCs with Cu-added (LaSr)MnO3 cathode

Sentencas: It is found that zero NOx emissions can be achieved no matter how large the inlet
Titulo: Effect of temperature and concentration on treating NO in simulated diesel exhaust via SOFCs with Cu-added (LaSr)MnO3 cathode

Sentencas: The major driving force for NOx conversion is not the electrical power.
Titulo: Effect of temperature and concentration on treating NO in simulated diesel exhaust via SOFCs with Cu-added (LaSr)MnO3 cathode

Sentencas: Cu addition by impregnation results in larger rate of NO decomposition than that by doping.
Titulo: Effect of temperature and concentration on treating NO in simulated diesel exhaust via SOFCs with Cu-added (LaSr)MnO3 cathode
